name: Flappy Bumbee - Honey Bumble Swarm
description:
Bumbees are on their first flight...
Can you help them out !!!

Catch the cOins...
Get as many pOints as pOssible!!!
Challenge your Friends!!!

*** How to Play ***
- Tap the screen to make your Bum Bee fly.
- Dodge any obstacles that get in your way.
- Go to the maximum distance, if you can!!!

=== Download Now and EnjOy ===
Fun for all Ages!!!

Features:
- Incredibly simple Gameplay!
- Endless Tap Flying!
- AwesOme Graphics!
- Indiana Bee, ZomBee, Captain Jack Bee, College Punk Bee And a lot more to play with!!!
- Enter "Wrap Zone" to get coins Booster
- Simply the Best Game for all!!!:)

Caution : Dnt break your phone plz ;)
